items.name: Portal to the Firing Line
items.target: Each creature and object in the area

effects.name: Special
effects.effect: This ability targets only non-prone creatures.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: A target creature can choose to drop prone, in which case the ability takes a bane against them.

The area remains active until Vesper is reduced to 0 Stamina or until the end of the encounter. Any non-prone enemy who enters the area for the first time in a round or starts their turn there takes 15 damage, or 7 damage if they choose to fall prone.

items.name: Portal to the Mantle
items.target: Each creature and object in the area

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The area is difficult terrain. Any creature who enters the area for the first time in a round or starts their turn there takes 10 fir damage. Until the end of the encounter, the size of the area increases by 1 at the start of each round.

items.name: Portal to the Void
items.target: Each creature and object in the area

effects.tier1: A<4 pull 3 toward the center of the area
effects.tier2: A<5 pull 3 toward the center of the area
effects.tier3: Pull 3 toward the center of the area

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: A portal appears at the center of the area. Any creature at the center of the area when this ability is used or who is pulled into the center for the first time in a round takes 10 sonic damage.

The area remains active and deals its damage until Vesper is reduced to 0 Stamina or until the end of the encounter. Any creature who enters the area and has A<4 is pulled 3 squares toward the center of the area. Any creature who starts their turn in the area and has M<4 is slowed until the end of their turn.

items.name: Portal to the Sky
items.trigger: The target moves within distance of Vesper.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The target is dropped through a portal, which teleports them up to 7 squares above a space within 15 squares.

Each ally who starts their turn within 10 squares of Vesper can teleport whenever they willingly move until the end of their turn. Whenever an affected ally teleports, they deal an extra 5 damage on their next strike.

When Vesper is reduced to 0 Stamina, they move up to their speed and then explode, dealing 4d6 damage to each adjacent enemy and object. Any enemy who takes more than 14 damage this way vertically slides 5 squares.
